description: AN ACT relating to motor vehicles; revising notarization requirements for certificates of title and bills of sale for motor vehicles be notarized; specifying the manner in which interest is held in motor vehicles; modifying the form for bills of sale; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Internationally active insurance groups.
description: AN ACT relating to insurance; providing for supervision of internationally active insurance groups; providing duties and responsibilities; providing definitions; conforming provisions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Insurance code updates.
description: AN ACT relating to insurance; modifying provisions relating to licensing fees and other charges; modifying provisions relating to business entity insurance licenses; modifying provisions relating to licensing of title agents; repealing a provision; and providing for an effective date.

title: Water well drillers.
description: AN ACT relating to professions and occupations; clarifying the hiring authority of the state board of examining water well drilling contractors and water well pump installation contractors; specifying that the budget prepared by the secretary of the board is subject to approval by the board; and providing for an effective date.

title: Insurance-national accreditation waiver.
description: AN ACT relating to insurance; authorizing the insurance commissioner to request waivers to national association of insurance commissioners accreditation requirements; authorizing time limited rulemaking; and providing for an effective date.

title: Program evaluation standards.
description: AN ACT relating to legislative program evaluation; amending audit standard requirements; and providing for an effective date.

title: Election readiness account.
description: AN ACT relating to elections; creating a permanent account to pay for specified expenses in conducting future elections subject to the federal requirements of the Help America Vote Act; requiring reports; providing an appropriation; and providing for an effective date.

title: Teacher accountability.
description: AN ACT relating to education; modifying provisions governing teacher accountability; conforming provisions; repealing provisions regarding teacher and school leader accountability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Education accountability.
description: AN ACT relating to education accountability; generally modifying provisions of the Wyoming Accountability in Education Act; conforming provisions; repealing a provision; requiring rulemaking; and providing for an effective date.

title: National board teacher certification.
description: AN ACT relating to educators; modifying national board teacher certification incentive programs; repealing obsolete provisions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Virtual education amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to virtual education; modifying who may teach virtual education courses; modifying where a full-time virtual education student may be enrolled; and providing for an effective date.

title: Limited mining operations-amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to environmental quality; revising requirements for the continuation, termination and abandonment of limited mining operations as specified; providing for renewal of limited mining operations as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Transportation enterprise program investments.
description: AN ACT relating to public funds; authorizing investment of the transportation trust fund in equities through the pool A investment account; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Regulation of shed antler and big game horn collection.
description: AN ACT relating to game and fish; amending the game and fish commission's authority to regulate the collection of shed antlers and big game animal horns as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Unclaimed life insurance benefits.
description: AN ACT relating to insurance; imposing requirements on providers of life insurance, annuity contracts and retained asset accounts to confirm deaths of persons as specified; providing penalties; modifying related provisions within the Uniform Unclaimed Property Act; and providing for an effective date.

title: Trust company statutes-updates.
description: AN ACT relating to trust companies; establishing supervised trust companies and private family trust companies as specified; establishing requirements for trust company records; amending and creating definitions for trust companies; making conforming amendments; providing rulemaking authority; renumbering and amending statutes relating to trust companies; repealing obsolete and superseded provisions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Rule against perpetuity amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to property, conveyances and security transactions; amending the applicability of the rule against perpetuities to interests in real estate; eliminating the requirement to opt out of the rule for property held in trust other than real property; and providing for an effective date.

title: Environmental quality council-amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to environmental quality; amending staffing requirements, duties and procedures for the environmental quality council; amending the duties of the director of the department of administration and information and the director of the department of environmental quality related to the environmental quality council; amending duties of the department of environmental quality's advisory boards; and providing for an effective date.

title: Principal and income act-principal place of administration.
description: AN ACT relating to trusts and estates; specifying when a trust or estate is subject to the Wyoming Uniform Principal and Income Act; and providing for an effective date.

title: Nonresident tuition and fee rates.
description: AN ACT relating to higher education; requiring the University of Wyoming and community colleges to charge nonresident tuition and fees as specified; specifying applicability; authorizing implementation; and providing for effective dates.

title: Worker's compensation-air ambulances.
description: AN ACT relating to worker's compensation; providing for payments to air ambulance service providers; allowing air ambulance service fees to be collected from injured employees; providing for assistance to injured employees; providing clarifying amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Mail ballot elections.
description: AN ACT relating to elections; authorizing counties to conduct mail ballot elections; specifying requirements and procedures; prohibiting multiple voting; providing for rulemaking; revising the timeline for possession of ballots by county clerks; making conforming amendments; and providing for effective dates.

title: Elected official residency requirements.
description: AN ACT relating to county officers and district attorneys; prescribing residency requirements for election; prescribing when a vacancy in office occurs; providing applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Per diem rates.
description: AN ACT relating to per diem rates; increasing the statutory per diem rate for legislative activities; increasing per diem rates which are based upon the legislative rate; providing for adjustment of the per diem rate; and providing for an effective date.

title: National guard museum.
description: AN ACT relating to defense forces and affairs; designating the historic Wyoming national guard armory as a museum; and providing for an effective date.

title: Military code jurisdiction.
description: AN ACT relating to defense forces and affairs; clarifying the Wyoming military code's application to servicemembers; and providing for an effective date.

title: UW board of trustees-chairman.
description: AN ACT relating to the University of Wyoming; modifying appellations; allowing an increase in University of Wyoming board of trustees executive committee members; and providing for an effective date.

title: Preference point amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to game and fish; authorizing the game and fish commission to implement a preference point system for resident licenses as specified; authorizing rulemaking for awarding preference points to resident youth and other hunters as specified; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Midwife services-Medicaid.
description: AN ACT relating to medical assistance; requiring medical assistance to provide coverage for midwife services as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Expungement of juvenile court records.
description: AN ACT relating to juvenile justice; amending juvenile offender expungement provisions relating to agency and court records; providing a definition; and providing for an effective date.

title: Crime victim compensation eligibility clarification.
description: AN ACT relating to crime victims compensation; providing time limits for compensation awards; authorizing the division of victim compensation to extend compensation time limits for mental health counseling and care; amending the date compensation becomes available as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Agricultural feed products-civil liability.
description: AN ACT relating to civil actions; specifying that agricultural feed products are not subject to a strict liability standard of fault in civil actions; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Senate confirmation of water compact commissioners.
description: AN ACT relating to water; providing for senate confirmation of gubernatorial appointees of commissioners on interstate water compacts; and providing for an effective date.

title: Brand rerecording notices.
description: AN ACT relating to branding and ranging; specifying that the livestock board shall send brand rerecording notices by email and mail; repealing the certified mail requirement for brand rerecording notices; and providing for an effective date.

title: Reversion of funds-emergency fire suppression account.
description: AN ACT relating to state lands; providing that unexpended, unobligated general funds appropriated to the division of forestry shall revert to the emergency fire suppression account at the end of a biennium; and providing for an effective date.

title: Legislative review of state land transfers.
description: AN ACT relating to state lands; requiring legislative review of state land exchanges and sales under specified conditions; establishing review procedures; amending standards relating to surface and mineral rights for land transfers; requiring public hearings as specified; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Lawful fence standards-county preemption.
description: AN ACT relating to fences and cattle guards; preempting county regulation of lawful fence standards; and providing for an effective date.

title: Public works and contracts.
description: AN ACT relating to public works and contracts; modifying requirements for the procurement of furniture and movable equipment in capital construction projects; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Probation and parole-incentives and sanctions.
description: AN ACT relating to criminal procedure and sentencing; establishing an incentives and sanctions system for probation and parole supervision as specified; specifying authorized sanctions; providing a procedure for imposing sanctions; providing definitions; providing for the award of credit against original sentences for parolees; requiring the use of validated risk and need assessments; clarifying requirements for placement in an intensive supervision program; making conforming amendments; specifying applicability; providing rulemaking; repealing obsolete provisions; providing an appropriation; requiring reports; and providing for effective dates.

title: Federal natural resource policy account-amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to the federal natural resource policy account; authorizing expenditure of funds in the account as specified; providing an appropriation; and providing for an effective date.

title: Transport of mobile homes-copy of title.
description: AN ACT relating to title and registration; authorizing the use of a copy of a title for the transport of a mobile home; and providing for an effective date.

title: Uniform Trust Code amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to the Uniform Trust Code; eliminating claims of forced heirship and legitime; providing a definition of legitime; clarifying discretionary distribution standards for a trustee; specifying review of discretionary powers of a trustee; and providing for an effective date.

title: Financial technology sandbox.
description: AN ACT relating to trade and commerce; making legislative findings; creating the financial technology sandbox for the testing of financial products and services in Wyoming; authorizing limited waivers of specified statutes and rules under certain conditions; establishing standards and procedures for sandbox applications, operations and supervision; authorizing reciprocity agreements with other regulators; requiring criminal history background checks; creating an account; requiring a consumer protection bond; specifying standards for the suspension and revocation of sandbox authorization; authorizing rules and orders; and providing for effective dates.

title: Sunset date-Wyoming investment in nursing program.
description: AN ACT relating to the administration of government; repealing the sunset date of the Wyoming investment in nursing program; and providing for an effective date.

title: Constituent service allowance.
description: AN ACT relating to the legislature; modifying the legislative constituent service allowance as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Underage marriage-exceptions repeal.
description: AN ACT relating to the marriageable age; amending the minimum marriageable age; providing conforming amendments; providing applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Series LLCs-naming and fees.
description: AN ACT relating to business entities; specifying that a series limited liability company may be named or designated in any manner; requiring registered agents to maintain series naming or designation information; prohibiting the adoption of rules relating to series naming or designation requirements and filing requirements; imposing a fee for series limited liability companies as specified; requiring the repeal of specified rules; providing an appropriation; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming Utility Token Act-property amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to property; making legislative findings; establishing that open blockchain tokens with specified consumptive characteristics are intangible personal property and not subject to a securities exemption; providing definitions; requiring developers and sellers of open blockchain tokens to file notices of intent and fees with the secretary of state; authorizing specified enforcement actions; making specified violations unlawful trade practices; repealing provisions granting open blockchain tokens a securities exemption; specifying applicability; providing an appropriation; and providing for effective dates.

title: Pharmacy benefit managers-prescription cost notification.
description: AN ACT relating to regulation of pharmacy benefit managers under the insurance code; providing that a pharmacy benefit manager shall not prohibit or penalize disclosure of prescription cost information or affordable alternatives; and providing for an effective date.

title: Indexing fuel taxes.
description: AN ACT relating to fuel taxes; adjusting gasoline, diesel fuel and alternative fuel tax rates by indexing the tax rate to the consumer price index; and providing for an effective date.

title: Procurement amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to the administration of government; modifying provisions relating to the procurement of services by public entities; subjecting school districts to the requirements of the Professional Architectural, Engineering and Land Surveying Services Procurement Act; providing applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Lodging tax.
description: AN ACT relating to sales tax; imposing a statewide tax on sales of lodging services; providing for distribution of the tax collected; revising the local optional lodging tax; repealing conflicting provisions; repealing the lodging tax exemption for outfitters and guides; creating the Wyoming tourism account; providing for implementation of the new tax; and providing for an effective date.

title: Sales tax revisions.
description: AN ACT relating to sales and use tax; providing that the sales tax shall apply to sales of specified services; reducing the sales and use tax rates; repealing the sales and use tax exemption on food for domestic home consumption; repealing additional sales and use tax exemptions; making conforming changes; and providing for an effective date.

title: School funding revenue.
description: AN ACT relating to school finance; providing additional mills for school funding as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Collection of sales tax by marketplace facilitators.
description: AN ACT relating to sales tax; requiring marketplace facilitators to collect and remit sales taxes as specified; specifying relief for failure to collect and remit the tax; providing immunity for facilitators collecting the tax; providing definitions; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Commercial filing system.
description: AN ACT relating to the secretary of state; authorizing the secretary of state to develop and implement a blockchain filing system; authorizing the promulgation of rules; and providing for an effective date.

title: Equal pay-penalties.
description: AN ACT relating to labor and employment; amending penalties for violations of equal pay provisions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wage transparency.
description: AN ACT relating to labor and employment; prohibiting an employer from barring an employee from disclosing wage information; prohibiting an employer from requiring an employee to waive wage disclosure rights; prohibiting an employer from discriminating against an employee as specified; specifying employer actions which constitute an unfair employment practice; and providing for an effective date.

title: Use of dogs-recovery of killed or wounded big game.
description: AN ACT relating to game and fish; allowing a person to use a leashed blood-trailing dog to help recover a killed or wounded big game animal; specifying requirements for any person using a dog to recover a game animal; and providing for an effective date.

title: Special purpose depository institutions.
description: AN ACT relating to banking; making legislative findings; creating special purpose depository institutions as a new financial institution; providing that special purpose depository institutions shall be corporations; requiring that depositors be business entities; specifying compliance with applicable federal laws; establishing procedures for the incorporation, chartering and operation of special purpose depository institutions; establishing procedures for liquidation, conservatorship and voluntary dissolution; requiring a surety bond or pledged investments and specified private insurance; authorizing special purpose depository institutions to obtain federal deposit insurance; making conforming amendments; authorizing positions; providing an appropriation; and providing for effective dates.

title: Background check requirements-professional licensure.
description: AN ACT relating to criminal history records; requiring individuals certified by the professional teaching standards board to submit to a criminal history record background check every ten years after initial certification; requiring speech-language pathologists, audiologists and assistants to submit to a criminal history record background check as a condition of licensure; making conforming amendments; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming Beer Freedom Act.
description: AN ACT relating to alcoholic beverages; authorizing appropriate licensing authorities to issue twenty-four hour malt beverage permits to microbreweries; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Cigarette tax administration.
description: AN ACT relating to cigarette tax administration; maintaining the current cigarette tax rate; amending the description of the rate; conforming the distribution of the tax; and providing for an effective date.

title: Education major maintenance funding.
description: AN ACT relating to community college and school district funding; providing for quarterly distribution of major maintenance funding to community colleges and school districts; increasing the amount that may be spent on a capital construction project without legislative approval; increasing the percentage of unrestricted community college operating funds which may be carried forward to subsequent biennial periods; and providing for effective dates.

title: School finance interfund loans.
description: AN ACT relating to interfund loans; amending provisions relating to interfund loans to the school foundation program account; clarifying provisions for interfund loans as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: School capital construction-supplemental budget.
description: AN ACT relating to supplemental appropriations for school facility needs; modifying prior appropriations relating to school facilities; making additional appropriations relating to school facilities; making certain appropriations subject to specified terms and conditions; providing for a transfer of funds; and providing for an effective date.

title: Omnibus water bill-planning.
description: AN ACT relating to water development projects; authorizing specified level I and level II studies; providing appropriations; requiring reports; providing for reversion of unexpended funds; authorizing unobligated funds to be used to complete other designated projects as specified; providing for groundwater studies funding; and providing for an effective date.

title: Veterans' skilled nursing facility.
description: AN ACT relating to veterans; establishing a skilled nursing facility for veterans and their spouses; specifying that nonveterans may be admitted to the facility; designating administration and operation requirements; authorizing level III design, construction and operation plans and construction; authorizing application for and spending of federal funding; authorizing a loan; providing for a continuous appropriation; providing for repayment of the loan; allowing acceptance of donations and monies; establishing an account; providing for rulemaking; requiring reporting; and providing for an effective date.

title: Revenue information system.
description: AN ACT relating to motor vehicle records; requiring the department of transportation to maintain the existing revenue information system; specifying duties of the department regarding implementation of a new system; providing an appropriation; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wage equality-state employees and programs.
description: AN ACT relating to employment; promoting wage equality in state employment; requiring the consideration of wage equality in state programs as specified; requiring the reporting of wage information as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: State health reinsurance program.
description: AN ACT relating to insurance; creating the state health reinsurance program for the reduction of health insurance costs as specified; levying a premium assessment on insurers; creating an account; providing standards for a state innovation waiver application to the federal government; requiring the adoption of rules; repealing provisions relating to the state health reinsurance program; and providing for an effective date.

title: Summary probate procedures.
description: AN ACT relating to the probate code; creating a definition for summary probate procedures; specifying how distribution through intervening estates may take place; specifying limits for creditor claims to distributed property; amending procedures for summary probate distribution; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Damages-evidence of health care costs.
description: AN ACT relating to civil procedure; providing that evidence of health care service bills are admissible as specified; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Repeal-seat belt evidence prohibition.
description: AN ACT relating to motor vehicles and the regulation of traffic on highways; repealing a provision related to the admissibility of seat belt evidence; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wage garnishment.
description: AN ACT relating to civil procedure and trade and commerce; amending garnishment provisions to extend protections for exempt funds; specifying applicability; providing definitions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Community college police officer retirement.
description: AN ACT relating to public employee benefits; providing for community college police officer participation in the law enforcement plan under the Wyoming Retirement Act; authorizing election by current community college police officers; specifying implementation; and providing for an effective date.

title: Patching Prexy's Pasture parallelogram problem.
description: AN ACT relating to the University of Wyoming; correcting the legal description of Prexy's Pasture on the University of Wyoming campus; and providing for an effective date.

title: Asbestos actions.
description: AN ACT relating to civil procedure; establishing procedures regarding asbestos actions and asbestos bankruptcy trust claims; providing definitions; providing applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Tourism improvement districts.
description: AN ACT relating to counties, cities and towns; authorizing the establishment of tourism improvement districts as specified; specifying requirements; providing definitions; specifying duties and powers of tourism improvement districts; authorizing assessments; providing for a limitation on actions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Construction contracts-indemnity provisions.
description: AN ACT relating to construction contracts; limiting the enforceability of indemnity related provisions in construction contracts; specifying applicable law; providing exceptions; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Special purpose tax-excess funds.
description: AN ACT relating to local sales and use tax; authorizing the distribution and expenditure of excess taxes collected for a specific purpose under specified conditions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wind energy production tax.
description: AN ACT relating to the tax on production of energy from wind resources; increasing the tax rate; providing for distribution of the tax; and providing for an effective date.

title: Taxation of broadband internet infrastructure.
description: AN ACT relating to sales and use tax; providing an exemption from sales and use taxes for broadband internet service infrastructure as specified; requiring reports; specifying a sunset date; and providing for an effective date.

title: Rights of way-communications services.
description: AN ACT relating to rights-of-way; authorizing communications companies to install equipment within the rights-of-way of public roads; providing definitions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming public lands day.
description: AN ACT relating to state holidays and observances; providing for a public lands day; and providing for an effective date.

title: Use of hemp extracts.
description: AN ACT relating to public health and safety; authorizing adults to possess and use hemp extract; eliminating registration requirements; authorizing a parent or legal guardian to administer hemp extract to a minor or vulnerable adult; and providing for an effective date.

title: Joint powers boards-natural gas service.
description: AN ACT relating to local powers; authorizing joint powers boards to create and operate natural gas systems; and providing for an effective date.

title: Hunter safety course-preference points.
description: AN ACT relating to game and fish; authorizing preference points for persons who complete a hunter safety course as specified; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Reporting of abortions.
description: AN ACT relating to abortions; establishing additional requirements for abortion reporting; providing for a public report of abortion statistics; authorizing the board of medicine to investigate and discipline specified conduct; and providing for an effective date.

title: Railroad safety.

title: Municipal services recovery actions.
description: AN ACT relating to municipal services; prohibiting municipalities from recovering past due payments for municipal services as specified; requiring adoption of related policies by municipalities; and providing for an effective date.

title: Party affiliation changes.
description: AN ACT relating to elections; revising provisions relating to political party affiliation changes by electors; and providing for an effective date.

title: Sexual assault parental rights.
description: AN ACT relating to termination of parental rights; including sexual assault as a factor that a court may consider to terminate parental rights as specified; specifying no reunification effort is required; and providing for an effective date.

title: Contractors-final payment provisions restructure.
description: AN ACT relating to public works and contracts; creating definitions; modifying language for consistency; modifying final settlement and payment to contractors procedures; updating bond requirements; requiring disputes be directed to a prime contractor's surety bond; and providing for an effective date.

title: Advanced psychiatric nurse practitioner program-amendment.
description: AN ACT relating to the University of Wyoming's advanced psychiatric nurse practitioner program; increasing, as a condition of program participation, the length of time a program participant may be required to agree to work in Wyoming; providing applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Gunshot and stab wound reporting.
description: AN ACT relating to public health and safety; requiring health care providers to report gunshot and stab wounds; providing definitions; providing a penalty; providing immunity for complying with reporting requirements; and providing for an effective date.

title: Environmental quality council-voting amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to environmental quality; specifying voting procedures of the environmental quality council; and providing for an effective date.

title: Electricity-certificated service areas.
description: AN ACT relating to public utilities; specifying determination of an electric utility's certificated service area; and providing for an effective date.

title: Special electric utility agreements.
description: AN ACT relating to electric utilities; providing requirements for service agreements between electric utilities and customers with specified electrical demands; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Shared parenting.
description: AN ACT relating to child custody; providing a presumption for issuance of an order of shared custody as specified; providing definitions; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Lifesaving measures-immunity.
description: AN ACT relating to civil and criminal liability; providing immunity from civil liability and criminal prosecution for entering a vehicle to render emergency assistance; providing an exception; and providing for an effective date.

title: New vehicle dealer claims.
description: AN ACT relating to motor vehicle franchises; modifying a provision relating to claims made by new vehicle dealers as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: College entrance exam-written component.
description: AN ACT relating to education; amending the minimum test requirements of a college entrance exam selected by the state superintendent; and providing for an effective date.

title: Family college savings program-repeal.
description: AN ACT relating to the family college savings program; repealing permissive statutes authorizing the state treasurer to administer a family college savings program; and providing for an effective date.

title: Sales tax recovery-statute of limitations.

title: Energy production inventory exemption.

title: Vacancies in office.
description: AN ACT relating to vacancies in office; modifying procedures for filling vacancies in specified offices; modifying time periods for filling specified vacancies; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Citizen standing.
description: AN ACT relating to actions against the state; providing standing for a resident to bring an action for declaratory judgment; providing requirements for a declaratory judgment action; authorizing the court to compel or enjoin conduct as specified; amending the governmental claims act; amending a conflicting provision; and providing for an effective date.

title: Naturopathy licensing board.
description: AN ACT relating to professions and occupations; establishing a naturopathy licensing board; providing for naturopathy licensing; providing procedures for licensure suspension and revocation; creating an account; providing an appropriation; and providing for an effective date.

title: Probation and parole-earned compliance credits.
description: AN ACT relating to criminal procedure and sentencing; establishing a system of earned compliance credits for probationers and parolees; specifying procedures; requiring rulemaking; specifying applicability; and providing for effective dates.

title: District court filing fees.
description: AN ACT relating to district courts; amending filing and other fees for probate and civil cases as specified; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Revenue recalibration task force.
description: AN ACT relating to taxation and revenue; creating the revenue recalibration task force as specified; establishing membership; providing duties and responsibilities; authorizing consulting services; requiring a report; providing appropriations; and providing for an effective date.

title: Tax refund to elderly and disabled.
description: AN ACT relating to taxation and revenue; amending eligibility criteria for the tax refund to the elderly and disabled program; providing for administration of the tax refund by the department of revenue; requiring rulemaking; authorizing a position; providing an appropriation; and providing for effective dates.

title: Senior property tax exemption.
description: AN ACT relating to ad valorem taxation; providing a tax exemption for a portion of property owned by citizens aged sixty-five years of age and older; providing for application for the exemption; providing for calculation of the exemptions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Civics proficiency examination.

title: Wyoming Cowboy and Cowgirl Legacy Week.
description: AN ACT relating to holidays; making legislative findings; designating the third week of September as Wyoming Cowboy and Cowgirl Legacy Week; and providing for an effective date.

title: Build Wyoming-amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to administration of government; clarifying that the build Wyoming loan program is a revolving, continuing loan program; clarifying the amount of funds that may be loaned to political subdivisions for infrastructure projects and road or street projects; and providing for an effective date.

title: Hathaway scholarships-award increase.
description: AN ACT relating to the Hathaway scholarship program; increasing scholarship awards as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Hathaway expand Wyoming scholarships.
description: AN ACT relating to education; providing for scholarships to out-of-state students to attend Wyoming institutions of higher education; specifying scholarship amounts, eligibility requirements and other elements of the scholarships; providing for resident tuition for scholarship recipients; creating a selection committee; creating accounts; making the award of scholarships contingent on funding as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Livestock brands-amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to brands; amending procedures regarding brands as specified; creating a permanently recorded brand; requiring rulemaking; repealing unnecessary provisions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Hunting licenses-donation to grizzly bear attack victims.
description: AN ACT relating to game and fish; creating a program to provide compensation for people injured by a grizzly bear attack in the state; authorizing voluntary payments to the program; creating an account; requiring rulemaking; and providing for an effective date.

title: School district teacher adjustment.
description: AN ACT relating to public school finance; modifying the education resource block grant model to provide additional funding to certain school districts for teacher positions; modifying a definition; providing an appropriation; and providing for an effective date.

title: Hathaway eligibility requirements.
description: AN ACT relating to the Hathaway scholarship program; modifying the Hathaway success curriculum; requiring a study; and providing for an effective date.

title: Sales tax payments.
description: AN ACT relating to sales tax; clarifying liability for payment of tax to the incorrect jurisdiction; providing for audits for payment of tax to the incorrect jurisdiction; creating an account for payment of revenue to the appropriate jurisdiction; and providing for an effective date.

title: Uranium taxation rates.
description: AN ACT relating to uranium taxation; providing for a uranium severance tax exemption; providing for imposition of a conditional uranium severance tax relative to specified spot market prices; repealing conflicting provisions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Abortion-48 hour waiting period.
description: AN ACT relating to health and public safety; requiring physicians to wait a specified period of time before performing certain nonemergency abortion procedures; and providing for an effective date.

title: Front license plate freedom.
description: AN ACT relating to motor vehicles; providing that motor vehicles are not required to display a front license plate; specifying that the department of transportation shall only issue one (1) license plate for motor vehicles; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wildlife and natural resource trust account board-duties.
description: AN ACT relating to wildlife and natural resource funding; authorizing the wildlife and natural resource trust account board to make recommendations as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Presentence investigation reports-judicial discretion.
description: AN ACT relating to criminal procedure and sentencing; specifying when a presentence investigation report must be completed for convicted felony defendants; making conforming amendments; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Citation in lieu of arrest.
description: AN ACT relating to criminal procedure; limiting peace officer authority to arrest as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Death penalty repeal-2.
description: AN ACT relating to crimes and offenses and criminal procedure; repealing the death penalty; eliminating procedures related to the imposition and execution of death sentences; making conforming amendments; providing applicability; remanding existing death sentences; repealing obsolete provisions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Local government publication requirements.
description: AN ACT relating to counties, cities and towns; amending publication requirements for names of employees and local elected officials; and providing for an effective date.

title: K-2 foreign language requirement.
description: AN ACT relating to education; making permissive the requirement that school districts provide instruction in foreign languages to students in kindergarten through second grade; and providing for an effective date.

title: State offices-contract transparency.
description: AN ACT relating to government ethics; requiring elected officials and members of the legislature to disclose information on contracts with the state as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Abandoned buildings revitalization.
description: AN ACT relating to cities and towns; providing a tax credit for expenditures to improve abandoned buildings; providing for designation of abandoned buildings; and providing for an effective date.

title: County election nominations.
description: AN ACT relating to elections; modifying procedures for nominating candidates for county office in primary elections as specified; providing conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Ban on sanctuary cities and counties.
description: AN ACT relating to cities, towns and counties; prohibiting the implementation of immigration sanctuary policies by cities, towns and counties; providing penalties; requiring certification of compliance; requiring a report; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming Underground Facilities Notification Act-amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to underground public utility facilities; modifying requirements for architectural and engineering plans that call for excavation; requiring premarking of an area or path of excavation as specified; requiring emergency services for contact with or damage to underground facilities as specified; providing exemptions from notice requirements as specified; modifying penalties; providing for definitions; requiring reports; and providing for an effective date.

title: Public reports-state spending and revenues.
description: AN ACT relating to administration of government; requiring public reports on state spending and revenues as specified; requiring the posting of state entity requests and contracts for supplies and services as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Restriction on public benefits.
description: AN ACT relating to public benefits; conditioning eligibility for state or local public benefits on lawful presence in the United States; requiring verification of lawful presence in the United States upon application for state or local public benefits; specifying penalties; and providing for an effective date.

title: Guardianships-reintegration planning authorized.
description: AN ACT relating to guardianships; authorizing court orders related to the termination of guardianships as specified; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Sound Money Pension Act.
description: AN ACT relating to public funds; requiring a portion of Wyoming retirement system assets to be held as specie; providing for storage of specie; specifying that public funds may be invested in specie; providing applicability; providing legislative findings; and providing for an effective date.

title: Termination of parental rights-standing.
description: AN ACT relating to children and parents; creating standing for biological grandparents acting in loco parentis to petition for the termination of parental rights; and providing for an effective date.

title: Traffic violations-no imprisonment penalty.
description: AN ACT relating to motor vehicle penalties; removing the imprisonment penalty under the general penalty provisions for motor vehicles, for traffic violations and the Driver's License Act; providing for imprisonment penalties for specified violations; and providing for an effective date.

title: Volunteer reserve officers-liability coverage.
description: AN ACT relating to the state self-insurance program; providing volunteer reserve officers coverage under the state self-insurance program; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Female genital mutilation.
description: AN ACT relating to crimes and offenses; defining sexual intrusion to include female genital mutilation; specifying that transporting a minor for the purpose of female genital mutilation is a crime; and providing for an effective date.

title: Statewide 911 coordinator.
description: AN ACT relating to emergency telephone service; requiring designation of a statewide 911 coordinator; specifying duties of the statewide 911 coordinator; and providing for an effective date.

title: Alcoholic liquors markup amount.
description: AN ACT relating to alcoholic liquors; increasing the maximum profit to the state from alcoholic liquor sales from the Wyoming liquor division; and providing for an effective date.

title: Child labor penalties.
description: AN ACT relating to employment of children; clarifying the penalties for violating child labor laws; clarifying an exemption; repealing a provision; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming film production incentive.
description: AN ACT relating to economic development; creating the Wyoming film production incentive program; authorizing incentives for qualified film productions; authorizing investments in branded entertainment; authorizing matching funds for local film production opportunities; requiring rulemaking; providing for penalties; requiring reports; providing for a transfer of funds; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming children's trust fund-expenditures.
description: AN ACT relating to the Wyoming children's trust fund; amending the authorizations for the expenditure and disbursement of assets in the trust fund as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Electric vehicle fee.
description: AN ACT relating to motor vehicles; increasing the annual decal fee for a plug-in electric vehicle; specifying form of electric vehicle decals; and providing for an effective date.

title: Severance tax on coal.
description: AN ACT relating to coal taxation; reducing the severance tax rate for surface coal as specified; conforming related tax distribution provisions; providing applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Free parking requirement-repeal.
description: AN ACT relating to motor vehicles; repealing a requirement for government agencies to provide free parking in certain areas; and providing for an effective date.

title: Lifetime fishing licenses for permanently disabled persons.
description: AN ACT relating to game and fish; authorizing the game and fish commission to issue lifetime complimentary fishing licenses and conservation stamps for permanently and totally disabled residents as specified; requiring rulemaking; and providing for effective dates.

title: Child protective service workers-training.
description: AN ACT relating to child protective services; amending training requirements of child protective service workers; and providing for an effective date.

title: Hemp, cannabidiol and other controlled substance regulation.
description: AN ACT relating to food and drugs; amending substances regulated by the controlled substances act; requiring the commissioner of drugs and substances control to conform controlled substances regulation to federal law within a specified period; providing for hemp production and hemp processing; providing rulemaking authority; providing a penalty; authorizing the use and possession of hemp and hemp products; repealing conflicting provisions; requiring the department to submit a state plan for the regulation of hemp; providing appropriations; requiring a report; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming Budget Stabilization Act.
description: AN ACT relating to public funds; creating the Wyoming Budget Stabilization Act; specifying limits on state expenditures; specifying distribution of surplus funds; requiring review of related statutes; and providing for effective dates.

title: Court supervised treatment program account.
description: AN ACT relating to court supervised treatment programs; revising provisions relating to the court supervised treatment program account; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming Sound Money Trust Act.
description: AN ACT relating to public funds; authorizing a portion of permanent mineral trust fund assets to be held as specie; providing storage requirements; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming insurance guaranty association-revisions.
description: AN ACT relating to insurance; generally modifying provisions of the Wyoming Life and Health Insurance Guaranty Association Act; amending and creating definitions; ensuring consistent usage of terms; amending provisions governing coverage provided by the association, limitations to the coverage and the association's maximum financial responsibilities; amending the powers and duties of the association; amending provisions governing association members' assessments; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Tobacco settlement funds research standards.

title: Court supervised treatment programs-prosecutor's consent.

title: Prospective employees-salary history.
description: AN ACT relating to labor and employment; prohibiting an employer from seeking or relying on salary history information of a prospective employee as specified; specifying employer actions which constitute an unfair employment practice; and providing for an effective date.

title: Food trucks.

title: Mixed martial arts regulation.

title: Senior health care special districts.

description: AN ACT relating to school finance; amending an appropriation to the Wyoming department of education for special education out of district placements; and providing for an effective date.

title: Repeal gun free zones and preemption amendments-2.

title: Private roads.
description: AN ACT relating to private roads; amending private road provisions to create private road easements; revising private road establishment processes and standards; requiring imposition of a bond; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Corporate stock-certificate tokens.
description: AN ACT relating to corporate shares and distributions; authorizing corporations to issue certificate tokens in lieu of stock certificates as specified; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Out-of-state shipments of manufactured wine-tax.
description: AN ACT relating to alcoholic beverages; amending the amount of the tax on out-of-state shipments of manufactured wine; and providing for an effective date.

title: Controlled substance schedules-federal uniformity.
description: AN ACT relating to controlled substances; requiring the commissioner of drugs and substances control to conform controlled substances regulation to federal law within a specified period; requiring rulemaking as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Cities and towns-zoning protests.
description: AN ACT relating to zoning; modifying requirements for protesting changes in city or town regulations, restrictions or district boundaries; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wide load restrictions-agriculture.
description: AN ACT relating to commercial vehicles; providing an exception to signage requirements for implements of husbandry being transported less than a specified distance; requiring review of rules; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming Sound Money Reserve Act.
description: AN ACT relating to public funds; requiring a portion of legislative stabilization reserve account assets to be held as specie; providing storage requirements; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Driver's licenses-medical alert designation.
description: AN ACT relating to driver's licenses; authorizing a medical alert designation on a person's driver's license or identification card; providing immunity from civil and criminal liability as specified; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Voter fraud prevention.

title: Wyoming career technical pathway workforce strategy.
description: AN ACT relating to workforce development; creating the Wyoming career technical pathway trust fund; authorizing funding for career technical training, internships, opportunities and services; requiring rulemaking; conforming provisions; authorizing a contract position; providing for appropriations; and providing for an effective date.

title: Electronic notice-portable electronic device insurance.
description: AN ACT relating to the insurance code; modifying requirements for providing electronic notices for portable electronic device insurance; and providing for an effective date.

title: Local regulation-subdivisions.

title: K-12 school district reserve increase.

title: Wyoming Administrative Procedure Act clarification.

title: Remote education agreements.
description: AN ACT relating to virtual education; creating an exception to virtual education requirements; authorizing remote education agreements between school districts; providing requirements for the remote education; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming pregnant workers fairness act.
description: AN ACT relating to fair employment practices; specifying reasonable accommodations for medical needs arising from pregnancy, childbirth and related conditions as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Cities and counties-publication of notices.
description: AN ACT relating to cities, towns and counties; authorizing electronic publication of certain city, town and county notices as specified; making conforming amendments; repealing an obsolete provision; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Volunteer firefighter and EMT pension account-amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to pension accounts; increasing the member contribution paid to the volunteer firefighter and EMT pension account; authorizing an additional pension payment to members as specified; directing insurance premiums to the account as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Common college transcript-implementation.

title: Big and trophy game animals-minimum hunting age.

title: Video skill games.

title: Business licensing fees-2.
description: AN ACT relating to corporations, partnerships and associations; altering licensing fees as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Split estates-good faith negotiations-2.
description: AN ACT relating to oil and gas operations; authorizing surface owner objections for a failure to comply with good faith negotiations; specifying procedures; and providing for an effective date.

title: Split estates-measure of damages.
description: AN ACT relating to oil and gas operations; amending provisions related to surface damage and disruption payments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Collection agency board-members.
description: AN ACT relating to the collection agency board; amending the number of members of the collection agency board as specified; specifying composition of board members; making conforming amendments; specifying applicability; requiring appointments as specified; and providing for effective dates.

title: Mental health and substance use coverage parity.

title: Management council membership.
description: AN ACT relating to the legislature; amending provisions relating to the selection of a management council member at large; and providing for an effective date.

title: Real estate brokers-retention of records.
description: AN ACT relating to real estate brokers; decreasing the length of time licensed real estate brokers must keep and maintain records of real estate transactions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Child endangerment penalties-amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to crimes and offenses; amending penalties for the crime of abandoning or endangering children as specified; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming children's trust fund-amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to the Wyoming children's trust fund; amending the trust fund; creating the Wyoming children's income account; authorizing expenditure of the income account as specified; providing for distribution of fees; providing for the transfer of funds; specifying the fund source for current appropriations; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming camping act.

title: Tobacco tax.

title: Alcoholic beverages-24 hour permit.

title: National Retail Fairness Act.

title: Split estates-applicability of procedures.

title: Child sexual abuse protection division.

title: Marihuana reform.

title: Care of animals.

title: Wind energy production tax-repeal.
description: AN ACT relating to the tax on production of energy from wind resources; repealing the tax; and providing for an effective date.

title: Statewide official notices website.

title: Wind energy production tax-2.

title: Transportation commission contract immunity repeal.

title: Medical cannabis act.
description: AN ACT relating to controlled substances; providing for authorized medical cannabis; establishing licensing; granting rulemaking authority; providing for fees and enforcement; creating an account; providing penalties for violations; providing defenses to prosecution; providing definitions; and providing for effective dates.

title: Video skill games-2.

description: AN ACT relating to crimes and offenses; specifying that cruelty to animals includes wantonly using a snowmobile to kill or injure an animal; and providing for an effective date.

title: Codification of marital rights.
description: AN ACT relating to marital rights; amending statutory language to reflect United States supreme court precedent concerning same sex marriages and the rights of same sex married couples; codifying rights of parties legally authorized to marry in Wyoming; providing for parentage determinations for all marital couples; providing definitions; making conforming amendments; providing for a review of rules and regulations potentially impacted by this act; and providing for an effective date.

title: Property redemption.
description: AN ACT relating to the code of civil procedure; modifying provisions relating to the sale and redemption of realty sold under mortgage foreclosure or execution; authorizing a certificate of sale as specified; creating a purchaser's right of entry as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Alcoholic beverages-licensing authority powers.
description: AN ACT relating to alcoholic and malt beverages; providing that a licensing authority may restrict the issuance of alcoholic and malt beverages pursuant to local zoning ordinances; prohibiting the imposition of restrictive requirements in a license as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming Health Care Pricing Transparency Act.
description: AN ACT relating to health care; creating the Wyoming Health Care Pricing Transparency Act; requiring insurers to provide specified health claims data to group purchasers of private health benefit plans as specified; providing penalties and civil liability for misuse of certain health claims data; specifying certain disclosures relating to health care facility charges; requiring a report; requiring the adoption of rules; specifying applicability; and providing for effective dates.

title: UW student housing.
description: AN ACT relating to the University of Wyoming; providing for phase 1 and phase 2 of the University of Wyoming student housing project; providing for project parameters and requirements; amending the university supplemental bond program; providing legislative findings; providing a loan to defease existing outstanding University of Wyoming bonds; providing a line of credit for initial costs of construction; creating an account; providing an appropriation to the state loan and investment board for grants to the city of Laramie for a traffic study; providing an appropriation for legislative members of the task force; redirecting federal mineral royalties and requiring a corresponding reduction in the university standard budget request; continuing and providing additional duties to the University of Wyoming task force on housing; modifying membership of the task force; removing a moratorium on construction and construction related activities at the University of Wyoming; and providing for an effective date.

title: State trust lands-studies.
description: AN ACT relating to state lands; requiring the office of state lands and investments to study and prepare a proposed plan on the development of school trust land and other state trust lands as specified; requiring the office to solicit proposals as specified; requiring reports and a presentation of the plan; providing an appropriation; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming Pioneer Home-operational costs.
description: AN ACT relating to institutions of the state; requiring the Wyoming Pioneer Home to operate without a state subsidy as specified; authorizing specified actions by rule relating to indigent care in the Wyoming Pioneer Home; and providing for an effective date.

title: Cigarette tax.
description: AN ACT relating to cigarette taxes; increasing the tax on cigarettes; providing for the reporting and taxation of floor stock; and providing for an effective date.

title: K-3 reading assessment and intervention program.
description: AN ACT relating to education; amending the reading assessment and intervention program required for students in grades kindergarten through grade three; and providing for an effective date.

title: Surface water drainage systems-2.
description: AN ACT relating to cities and towns; granting to cities and towns the authority to fund surface water drainage systems by service charges as specified; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Investment of public funds.
description: AN ACT relating to administration of government; creating a Wyoming investment council; specifying powers and duties of the council; requiring retention of an investment coordinator within the state treasurer's office; modifying investment related duties and functions of the state treasurer, state treasurer's office and state loan and investment board; requiring a report and providing for further reorganization and transfer of investment functions by state entities; amending public meetings, public records and administrative procedures provisions in relation to the Wyoming investment council; specifying legislative intent; providing an appropriation; and providing for effective dates.

title: Motor vehicle fees.
description: AN ACT relating to motor vehicles; allowing for adjustment of fees by the department of transportation as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: WRS board member qualifications.
description: AN ACT relating to public funds; increasing the number of Wyoming retirement board members required to have professional expertise in investments and finance; specifying type of expertise required; providing applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Abortion-penalty for failure to inform.
description: AN ACT relating to health and public safety; creating a criminal penalty for physicians who fail to provide patients with specified information before certain nonemergency abortion procedures; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming skills upgrade training tax credit.
description: AN ACT relating to economic development; providing a tax credit for certain expenditures on skills upgrade training as specified; specifying duties of the Wyoming business council; authorizing rulemaking; and providing for an effective date.

title: Community colleges-degree programs.
description: AN ACT relating to postsecondary education; amending authorized academic programs at the community colleges; providing for community college commission approval of baccalaureate degree programs; conforming Hathaway scholarship statutes; creating reporting requirements; and providing for effective dates.

title: Land access study.
description: AN ACT relating to state lands; authorizing specified state agencies to cooperate to study land opportunities; requiring a study; requiring reporting; providing for an appropriation;  and providing for an effective date.

title: Employee group insurance-local governments-2.
description: AN ACT relating to public employee compensation and benefits; specifying that a local government entity may make coverage through the state employees' and officials' group insurance program available to the officers and employees of the entity; making conforming amendments; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Cost associated with decommissioning power plants.
description: AN ACT relating to public utilities; providing for the study of decommissioning of facilities generating electricity; providing for development of a process to recover costs to the state and local governments resulting from decommissioning; requiring a report; providing an appropriation; making legislative findings and specifying legislative intent; and providing for an effective date.

title: Modernizing and balancing Wyoming's school funding streams.
description: AN ACT relating to school finance; modifying provisions of the state's public school funding system; amending provisions regarding state lands mineral royalties and related bonding provisions; creating an account; amending reimbursement provisions for transportation services within the education resource block grant model; repealing conflicting provisions; requiring rulemaking; providing applicability; and providing for effective dates.

title: Elected officials' salaries.
description: AN ACT relating to state elected officials; increasing the salaries for state elected officials; providing for current salaries; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming's tomorrow.
description: AN ACT relating to education; providing for a study to create a grant program to make two years of education at Wyoming community colleges and the University of Wyoming as free as possible; creating a task force; specifying membership; providing parameters for the study and the program; creating an endowment fund; providing an appropriation for the study; providing for future implementation; and providing for an effective date.

title: Child support-substantial contributions.
description: AN ACT relating to child support; defining a term; authorizing the award of attorney fees for intentionally misrepresenting substantial contributions or facts related to factors considered for deviating from established child support as specified; making conforming amendments; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: State board of barbers and cosmetology.
description: AN ACT relating to professions and occupations; merging the state board of barber examiners into the state board of cosmetology; making conforming amendments; repealing obsolete provisions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Spending policy amendments-2.
description: AN ACT relating to public funds; amending the spending policy amount for the permanent Wyoming mineral trust fund and the common school account within the permanent land fund; repealing conflicting spending policy amounts; increasing amounts available for transfer from the permanent Wyoming mineral trust fund reserve account to ensure the full distribution to the strategic investments and projects account is available; and providing for an effective date.

title: Retiree cost-of-living payments.
description: AN ACT relating to retirement benefits administered by the Wyoming retirement system; providing for additional noncumulative benefit payments under the Wyoming Retirement Act, the Wyoming State Highway Patrol, Game and Fish Warden and Criminal Investigator Retirement Act, the Wyoming Judicial Retirement Act, the Firemen's Pension Account Reform Act of 1981 and the volunteer firefighter and EMT pension account; providing an appropriation; and providing for an effective date.

title: Forfeiture exemptions.
description: AN ACT relating to the Wyoming Controlled Substance Act; amending property forfeiture provisions; exempting property from seizure and forfeiture as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Civil asset forfeiture reform.
description: AN ACT relating to the Wyoming Controlled Substance Act; amending the procedure and requirements for forfeiting and seizing property; providing definitions; conforming provisions; and providing for an effective date.

title: Wyoming support for delisting the grizzly bear.
description: A JOINT RESOLUTION requesting the swift delisting under the Endangered Species Act of the Greater Yellowstone Ecosystem grizzly bear population; requesting a return of the species management to local control; and requesting full federal funding of species management until delisting occurs.

title: Funding sewage systems.
description: A JOINT RESOLUTION proposing to amend the Wyoming Constitution to remove the specific limit on the amount of debt a municipality can incur for a sewer project and to allow the legislature to prescribe by law the debt limit for municipal sewer projects; and to provide a ballot statement.

title: Supreme court justices-senate confirmation.
description: A JOINT RESOLUTION proposing to amend the Wyoming Constitution to require senate confirmation of Wyoming Supreme Court selections, to allow temporary selections and to provide a ballot statement.

title: Term limits-statewide elected officials.
description: A JOINT RESOLUTION proposing to amend the Wyoming Constitution; imposing term limits on the offices of state senator and state representative, the governor, secretary of state, treasurer, auditor and superintendent of public instruction; and providing a ballot statement.

title: State lands mineral royalties-constitutional amendment.
description: A JOINT RESOLUTION proposing to amend the Wyoming Constitution to provide that for six years all state mineral royalties earned from the lease of state school lands may be appropriated by the legislature for the support of the public schools and providing a ballot statement.

title: Legislative sessions.
description: A JOINT RESOLUTION proposing to amend the Wyoming Constitution by removing distinctions between legislative general and budget sessions including repealing the introductory vote requirement for bills in a legislative budget session and making conforming amendments.

title: Rescission of federal constitutional resolutions.
description: A JOINT RESOLUTION rescinding a previous resolution adopted by the Wyoming Legislature which requested the Congress of the United States to convene a constitutional convention under Article V of the U.S. Constitution.

title: Free and fair elections.
description: A JOINT RESOLUTION urging Congress to propose a constitutional amendment ensuring free and fair elections.

title: Permanent ban on state income tax.
description: A JOINT RESOLUTION proposing to amend the Wyoming Constitution to restrict the imposition of an income tax; and to provide a ballot statement.

title: Medal of Honor cities.
description: A JOINT RESOLUTION to designate cities and communities in the state of Wyoming as Medal of Honor cities or communities to honor the Medal of Honor recipients connected with the cities or communities.

title: General government appropriations-2.
description: AN ACT relating to supplemental appropriations for the operation of state government; increasing or decreasing certain amounts; adjusting the number of positions; modifying prior appropriations; making additional appropriations; requiring reports; making certain appropriations subject to the terms and conditions specified; providing transfers of certain funds as specified; directing amendments to the Medicaid state plan; and providing for effective dates.

title: Board of outfitters and guides-area of authorization.
description: AN ACT relating to guides and outfitters; authorizing the board of outfitters and guides to approve or deny areas of authorization for outfitters; and providing for an effective date.

title: Preference points.
description: AN ACT relating to game and fish; removing provisions providing for the loss of accumulated preference points as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Freestanding emergency center licensing-time extension.
description: AN ACT relating to public health and safety; extending the deadline for the licensure of freestanding emergency centers as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Budget reserve account-repeal.
description: AN ACT relating to the budget reserve account; repealing the budget reserve account; amending loan authority, distributions, reversions and transfers of funds authorized to or from the budget reserve account; providing for a general fund reserve amount and authorizing the transfer of excess general funds as specified; making conforming amendments; repealing obsolete language; and providing for an effective date.

title: Personal property tax reporting.
description: AN ACT relating to property taxes; revising the penalty for failing to report property to the county assessor; requiring the department of audit to collect property information during audits as specified; providing fees for nonreported and omitted taxable property; and providing for an effective date.

title: Alternate penalties & pretrial release for alcohol crimes.
description: AN ACT relating to criminal procedure and motor vehicles; amending 24/7 sobriety program provisions to increase access to the program and technology; creating a restricted driver's license for participants in 24/7 programs; removing restriction on state funding for the 24/7 administrator; providing additional driving privilege sanctions for driving while under the influence; providing penalties for violations; clarifying credit for time spent using ignition interlock devices; amending provisions relating to persons prohibited from driving without an interlock device; creating an account; repealing the sunset date for the 24/7 program; making conforming amendments; and providing for effective dates.

title: Court procedure amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to courts; amending terms of court for district courts; amending duties of court commissioners as specified; amending provisions in the Code of Civil Procedure, the Probate Code and drainage district laws related to terms of court and court actions in vacation; repealing provisions related to terms of court; and providing for an effective date.

title: Audit requirements for special fire and water districts.
description: AN ACT relating to special districts; exempting fire protection districts and water and sewer districts from the audit requirements of the Uniform Municipal Fiscal Procedures Act; amending oversight of districts as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Modification of probation.
description: AN ACT relating to criminal procedure and sentencing; providing standards for the imposition or modification of probation; clarifying probation supervision options; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Budget submission deadline.
description: AN ACT relating to the state budget; revising the date by which the governor submits the state budget to the legislature; conforming other reporting dates; and providing for an effective date.

title: Business licensing fees.
description: AN ACT relating to corporations, partnerships and associations; altering licensing fees as specified; and providing for an effective date.

title: Eminent domain-wind energy collector systems.
description: AN ACT relating to eminent domain; reimposing the moratorium on the exercise of the power of condemnation for wind energy collector systems for a period of time; specifying applicability; and providing for an effective date.

title: Public utilities-certificates of convenience and necessity.
description: AN ACT relating to public utilities; providing for the issuance of nonsitus certificates of public convenience and necessity; requiring certain public utilities to obtain a nonsitus certificate of public convenience and necessity; modifying provision governing certificates of convenience and necessity; specifying applicability of certificates; and providing for an effective date.

title: Certified public accountants act-revisions.
description: AN ACT relating to certified public accountants; generally modifying provisions regulating the practice of public accounting; and providing for an effective date.

title: Community development districts.
description: AN ACT relating to cities and towns; authorizing municipalities to create community development districts as specified; specifying requirements; providing definitions; specifying duties and powers of community development districts and district boards of directors; authorizing assessments; specifying duties of municipalities; amending definitions; and providing for an effective date.

title: County clerks-records.
description: AN ACT relating to county clerks and records; modifying provisions relating to records maintained by county clerks; authorizing electronic indexing of records maintained by county clerks; increasing certain fees for filing records with county clerks; and providing for an effective date.

title: Campaign finance revisions.
description: AN ACT relating to elections; modifying restriction on contribution of funds to political candidates for the general election as specified; modifying requirements for filing campaign reports as specified; requiring the filing of campaign reports relating to electioneering communications; amending campaign advertising provisions; repealing provisions relating to political speech by certain organizations; repealing archaic language; making conforming amendments; and providing for an effective date.

title: Telecommunications act-amendments.
description: AN ACT relating to telecommunications; extending the Wyoming Telecommunications Act's sunset date; conforming provisions related to the Wyoming universal service fund alternative distribution option and the benchmark price for essential local exchange services; and providing for an effective date.

title: Surface water drainage systems.
